feed.title: SAP Community - Settlement Management
feed.subtitle: Settlement Management Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Rebate and Royalties in SAP S/4
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We are on SAP S/4 2022 and we are looking to enable royalties using settlement management.We give royalties to the designer based on product sales. The business volume should be billing amount to customers for those specific products plus rebate. Business also give rebate to customer however it is offline. 

I think, to bring Rebate in royalties consideration, we need to enable Rebate via settlement management.

Here are the steps which we have followed:

1. Condition contract for Rebate 0S10.

2. Condition contract for Royalties 0RS1.

3. Sales order to billing flow, where we have captured Rebate and Royalties in condition type ( for accruals).

4. Ran settlement for Rebate. It has generated a settlement document.

5.Ran settlement for Royalties. It includes the billing document, however it does not consider the Rebate settlement. While running the business volume, we could not see rebate settlement in the list.

Observation- Rebate settlement document does not appear in VBRK. I think, to include in Royalties settlement, it should create SD billing document. Am i correct?

Am i missing any steps here?

 

Regards,

Sumit

entry.title: How to split settlement document based on customer and supplier vat registration number
How can I settle a single customer in multiple customer condition contract 0S02
entry.content: We have a requirement to settle a single customer (partial settlement) from a multiple customer condition contract 0S02. I tried using the Tcode WB2R_DOC_ENTRY but getting an error as No manual settlement documents allowed for contract type 0S02.  Kindly requesting SAP experts help.

entry.title: Manual Accrual getting reversed at the time of Delta Accrual
entry.content:
I have posted a Manual Delta Accrual of 300 $ as part of the data migration activity.

Later we have transactions in S4 leading to an accrual of 400 $, but when this accrual is posted by a Delta Accrual run, the 300$ posted by the manul delta accrual is reversed with condition RED2.

Is there a way to stop this reversal? I want the accruals both manual and by system to be reversed only at the time of settlement run.

entry.title: What is correct set up of Rebate sales condition types REA1 & RES1 in relevant pricing procedures ?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Experts,

Can someone please clarify on usage of S4 HANA sales rebate condition types REA1 and RES1 in the pricing procedures RVAA01 and A10005 ?

(RVAA01 - Customer sales/Billing pricing procedure.

A10005 - Condition contract pricing procedure for calculation of settlement amount.)

 

 As per my understanding/exploring,

Condition type REA1(Rebate Accruals) should be added in customer billing pricing procedure (RVAA01) to record and post the accrual amount for sales rebates within a sales document. But when I check the standard pricing procedure RAVV01 (attached screenshot), I see Rebate Condition RES1 is added, REA1 is not added.

Is this correct set up ? Please suggest the right setting.

 

Thank you,

Best Regards

Narendar

entry.title: List of invoices considered in settlement document
entry.content: In SAP S/4 Hana Sales, condition contract management, how to find a list of invoices which have been considered for rebate calculation in the settlement document?

entry.title: Settlement management
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I'm looking for a some guidance on settlement management. Currently working on migration project from ECC to S4 HANA where settlement management is impacted from SD side. Since client was already having rebate process, so my role is to map there current rebate structure in settlement management.

Since they have 11 reporting lines (condition types) for the rebates, and each one is going towards different Accrual/provisional rebate/settlement account and also from the CO-PA side . so now i wanted to understand how we can map this in s4 because earlier we were using same condition type for assigning the standard and accrual account key. now since we have separate condition type for rebate and accrual, what should be the correct approach.

Thank you in advance!!

 

Best regards,

Darshan.

entry.title: Manual Switch off of the distribution of manual accruals in the settlement document
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have activated the accruals distribution for the manual delta accruals settlement document in the settlement document type. Business has a requirement to switch off this distribution of manual accruals in few cases. In WB2R_DOC_ENTRY screen, i see the option for Distribution. Even though I select the field as "2 Not Relevant for Distribution" it is going back to "1 Relevant for Distribution". Is there a way to manually switch off the distribution of manual accruals in the settlement document when required?

Regards

Hari

entry.title: Manual Settlement Document – Reference Field Update
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Regarding the manual settlement document, we have a requirement to update the settlement document number in the Reference field, similar to how it is handled in the automatic settlement document.

Is there a way to achieve this using Transfer Manager, such that after creating the manual settlement document, the document number is automatically populated in the Reference field?

Please advise.

Thanks and Regards,

PM

entry.title: Ship-to party in business volume selection is not working
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am using the Ship-to Party in the Business volume selection. Ship-to is standard field in the business volume profile. When I create the sales documents, accrual condition is not determined (maintained the accrual condition at condition contract level). However, when i execute business volume report, invoices of the Ship-tos are displayed in the report. Any leads are much appreciated.

Regards

Hari

entry.title: Unable to delete product cost collector due to unsettled variances from May this year
entry.content:
I am trying to delete a product cost collector so I can revert a part from REM to discrete, but there are unsettled variances from May that is blocking it.

I stupidly deleted the variance from MF47 so no longer able to process it, and have cancelled the material documents that caused the variance which hasn't helped. 

Finance have run K088 and cleared everything they can, but these variances from May are still there. 

Is there any way to get these variances cleared?

entry.title: SAP SD Rebates migration to SAP S4 HANA Settlement Management historic data
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

We are in middle of system conversion from SAP ECC to SAP S4 HANA. Client has a requirement o migrate entire billing from past 10 years along with settled rebates document and rebate agreements for audit purposes.

Is it feasible to migrate closed agreements and settlement documents from ECC to S4 if we have the billing documents also migrated into S4.

Generally its not good practive to migrate closed agreements and archive and use reporting on archived data for future purpose is best practive but client wants to migrate the data.

Any help on how to approach this migration will be helpful and willit need a custom conversion program or which tool will be apt for this conversion. Any direction on this is much appreciated.

Thanks,

Santosh

@Lakshmipathi @NagarajP @Chris1973

entry.title: Portugal settlement document number range is not in sync with digital signature number range
entry.content:
During settlement, the sales rebate document is being created with correct sequence number as per country wise number range maintained in basic functions but the reference field in the settlement document is copying the number from digital signature number range (NR status). We have manually synced the number range of digital signature with country specific number range by changing the NR status of number range.

But whenever we are doing reversal of a settlement document, digital signature number range is not getting consumed and this is causing number mismatch between settlement document number and reference field number in the settlement document when we create the next documents.

Kindly share your inputs as i'm unable to understand what went wrong.

Settlement Management SAP S/4HANA 

@Lakshmipathi   @GauthierVictor

entry.title: Different Settlement Material to be used for single contract
entry.content:
Hi All,

In Condition Contract Management we can maintain only the settlement material at the header level, but we have a requirement wherein in single Sales rebate condition contract with Business volume is maintained at Product hierarchy level then for every product hierarchy we need to have a seperate settlement material. 

I checked the split criteria for Business volume but its not helping with achieving complete solution.

Any guidance will be much apprecited.

Thanks,

Santosh

Settlement Management #SAPS4HANA

entry.title: Hello experts, I am working for settlement managements in SAP and I am new to this module.
entry.content:
User reported an issue for the CCS process, when trying to create a settlement (Sales rebate delta accrula document )he is getting the the gross and net amount in Negative values instead of the postive value. 
For ex: 51.005,71- (negative amount) EUR instead of the positive value. 
Could anyone suggest how can check the root cause of the issue and si there any config to validate ?

entry.title: Incorrect Sign orientation for the sales rebates
entry.content:
Hi CCS Experts, 
User reported an issue for the CCS sales rebate, where the SIGN is inverted, like coming NEGATIVE for even an postive case. 
Monthly Accruals and the a bunch of Incoming invoices posted in September and another bunch in October, where for the month end 30.11.2025, the incoming invoices are being considered as the partial settlements. 
This is working fine till October month end and some how the logic got changed. 
How can check with developer, like where exactly I have to check in case of this issue ??

entry.title: Item from the previous manual delta accruals flowing into the manual delta accruals settlement doc
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have created two manual delta accruals settlement documents(ZS4B and ZS4C) which are copies of 0S4B. ZS4B has "Distribution" active and for ZS4C, "Distribution" is inactive. For ZS4B, distribution type is "3 - Distribution Based on Accruals(CCM)". The problem I am facing is that after the distribution in ZS4B, a line item is generating for the item from ZS4C. Is there a way to distribute the manual delta accruals only with the materials from the Business volume.

ZS4C:

ZS4B - with Distribution:

The second line item in the distribution is generated for the previous manual delta accruals. This should not come in the distribution.

Regards

Hari

@MichaelWerner , @GauthierVictor

entry.title: Accrual reversals before final settlement
entry.content:
Hi All,

We generally reverse the remaining accruals at the end of the CC validity i.e., once CC is fully settled and status is set to "Locked". However, sometimes, business wants to release the accruals much earlier partially without waiting for final settlement to run to release the remaining accrual at the validity end of the contract.

What is the best way forward for it?

Regards

Samier Danish

entry.title: RES1 smaller than accrual REA2 same value as RES1
entry.content:
We are having Z Conditions :

 

Problem is that payout will be smaller than the builded accrual but we won't balance the complete accrual value

Tried to use the REA5 (YEA5) but then the deducted value is double so on this case I will payout 5 € the REA2(YRA4) is the complete amount of 197,40 and the YEA5 is the accrual minus 2*5 € do left in the accrual account 187,40 from my opinion this is not correct. Does anybody have a solution or explanation for me?

entry.title: Two different subtotals for a Rebate condition contract
entry.content:
Hi All,

We have a requirement where for some items Net value should be the rebate basis. Whereas for other items it should be gross price. Is it possible to have two different Rebate basis's for a Contract. In the Settlement data Tab, we can select only on value. Also, let me know how the "Amount Fields - Split Criteria" in the Business volume profile works.

@GauthierVictor@MichaelWerner
